metadata.title: PM expresses grief over demise of Aftab Shaban Mirani

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Nov 01 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Saturday expressed grief over the death of Sindh Chief Minister Aftab Shaban Mirani. He prayed for the late leader and for patience and fortitude for the bereaved family. Aftab Shaban was an experienced political leader and senior parliamentarian of the Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP), he said adding the political and public services of the deceased will always be remembered.
